com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface Curve

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Geometry
All Known Subinterfaces:
Path, Ring, Segment
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePath, BaseRing, Line
public interface Curve
extends Geometry

This interface implements an abstract class that represents simple linear objects, such as, arcs, segments, paths, and rings.

Method Summary
 Point getEndPoint()
          Returns the last point that determines the curve.
 Point getStartPoint()
          Returns the first point of the curve.
 boolean isClosed()
          Determines if the first and last points of the curve are coincident.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Geometry
clone, getEnvelope, getEnvelope, getEnvelopeByRef
 

Method Detail

isClosed

public boolean isClosed()
Determines if the first and last points of the curve are coincident.

Returns:
True if the points are coincident, else False
